scripts.install:all: cd magnetic-apparels-node && npm install && cd ../magnetic-apparels-vue && npm install && cd ../magnetic-apparels-react && npm install && cd ../magnetic-apparels-angular && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:node" "npm run start:vue" "npm run start:react" "npm run start:angular"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:node" "npm run start:vue" "npm run start:react" "npm run start:angular"
